page.title: 05PLAYGROUND GAMES, HENFIELD.
page.content: Polo by Nicole. One person stands at the top of the playground and as many people as you like at the bottom. The person at the top calls someone and gives them a name of a thing, for example a flower The person goes back and tells the rest. Everyone chooses the name of a flower and someone calls them out. The person at the top picks one. The other person whose flower has been chosen runs to the top and back spelling out POLO. The person at the top does so as well and whoever gets back to their place first is the new leader. Television Programmes by Cassie. The leader stands away from the group. He thinks of a T.V.Programme and says the initials.If someone can think of the name they run four times and shout it out.If right they're it.
